title: Ex-Manchester United star Lee Sharpe proposes to girlfriend at Cheltenham Festival
text:

Lee Sharpe's girlfriend got a romantic treat at Cheltenham Festival on Ladies Day as her man popped the question to make it a very special day. 
The former Manchester United footballer - who made 193 appearances for the Red Devils between 1988 and 1996 - got down on one knee to propose to his partner Lucie Gardner. 
The heartwarming moment went down in front of more than 250 guests during a sunny afternoon at the Pied Piper Ladies Day fundraiser, reports Gloucestershire Live. Lee has popped the question She said yes! 
It's been around six years since the loved up couple first started dating, and together they have a five-month-old son called Leo. 
Cathryn Hage - promotional board member of Pied Piper - organised the big event, and saw the proposal for herself. 
She said: "It was absolutely wonderful to witness. We fill the marquee with friends and supporters of the charity, and raised around Â£15,000 as a result. Celebrating the happy news 
"It was so nice because we had a great day, the weather was beautiful and then Lee proposed. 
"It was very special and everyone wished the couple well. It was a real buzz in the tent." Like us on Facebook
